title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
**Description:**

Introducing the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds! These earbuds are designed with your comfort in mind, especially for side sleepers. They are slim and lightweight, making them perfect for indoor use. 

With our advanced 4-Point Noise Masking System, you can enjoy a peaceful and uninterrupted sleep. The earbuds come with ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips to provide a secure seal and block out external noise. While they don't have active noise cancelling, our smart volume control feature adjusts the volume of the sleep sounds to mask any external noise.

Equipped with Bluetooth version 5.2, our earbuds ensure a stable and seamless connection. You can also take advantage of our app integration, which includes unlimited sleep sounds and the soundcore app for additional features.

Experience customized sleep sounds like never before! Our earbuds feature customized dynamic drivers that produce enhanced low-frequency sounds that are 10dB lower than standard ones, creating a soothing environment for a restful sleep.

But that's not all! Our earbuds also offer sleep management features. The sleep monitor keeps track of your sleep duration and quality, providing valuable feedback. You'll also love the automatic pause audio feature, which pauses the sounds once you fall asleep. And for those who need a personal alarm, our earbuds have got you covered without disturbing others.

Upgrade your sleep experience with the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Designed for side sleepers, lightweight, and snug fit without protruding, these earbuds provide all-night comfort. Please note that they are not suitable for outdoor use.

**Description:**

Introducing the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. These earbuds have been specially designed to provide you with a comfortable and peaceful night's sleep. They are perfect for side sleepers and are slim and lightweight, making them ideal for use indoors.

The earbuds feature a 4-Point Noise Masking System that helps to block out unwanted noise. With the included ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips, you can be sure that the earbuds will stay securely in place throughout the night. Additionally, the smart volume control adjusts the volume of the sleep sounds to mask any external noise.

With a Bluetooth version of 5.2, these earbuds offer a stable and reliable connection. They are also compatible with the soundcore app, which provides unlimited sleep sounds for a truly immersive experience. The customized dynamic drivers ensure enhanced low-frequency sounds that are 10dB lower than standard ones.

Not only do these earbuds provide a great sleep experience, but they also offer sleep management features. The sleep monitor tracks your sleep duration and quality, providing valuable feedback. The audio pause feature automatically stops playing once you fall asleep. And don't worry about waking others up with your alarm, as these earbuds come with a personal alarm setting.

Invest in the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds for a restful and rejuvenating sleep experience. Please note that these earbuds are designed for indoor use and may not be suitable for outdoor activities.

**Description:**

Introducing the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds! These earbuds are specially designed for side sleepers, providing utmost comfort throughout the night. They are slim and lightweight, ensuring a snug fit without any protrusions. Ideal for indoor use, these earbuds are not recommended for outdoor activities.

Equipped with a 4-Point Noise Masking System, these earbuds effectively block out external noise without active noise cancellation. The inclusion of ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips ensures a secure seal for uninterrupted sleep.

With Bluetooth version 5.2, these earbuds offer seamless connectivity to your devices. The soundcore app integration allows for a wide range of white noise and soothing sleep sounds, providing a personalized experience. The customized dynamic drivers produce low frequency sounds that are 10dB lower than standard ones, enhancing your sleep environment.

These earbuds also come with sleep monitoring functionality, providing valuable feedback on your sleep duration and quality. Additionally, the audio automatically pauses once you fall asleep, ensuring a peaceful rest. For added convenience, a personal alarm can be set to wake you up without disturbing others.

Upgrade your sleep experience with the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Order now and enjoy a restful night's sleep!
